name: test_e2e_with_logs[026_SQLI_TIME_017]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_017` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL pg_sleep with decimal |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `pg_sleep(5.5)`
- **Encoded**: `pg_sleep(5.5)`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~15000ms
- **Timestamp**: 15:09:22.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_017-1765465762358-qbtj5o pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_017 uri=/?q=pg_sleep(5.5) client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
15:09:22.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_017-1765465762358-qbtj5o pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_017 uri=/?q=pg_sleep(5.5) client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
